NL Translation: On a hot day, I can either book a flight or reply to emails. If I have financial aid, I can also reply to emails. If it is a hot day and I have financial aid, I prefer to book a flight. However, if it is a hot day, I have financial aid, and there is a school reunion, I prefer to reply to emails. I can't at the same time book a flight and reply to emails. A hot day and financial aid are not compatible. If it is dusk, I prefer to book a flight over replying to emails.
